reviewText: The song selection, length and performance for the concert was a 4. The picture was a 3. The sound was a 3. The video extras (old concerts were good) a 3 cause I don't care for videos. The concert production and mixing 3. My personal taste for the band a 5. This averages to a 3.5 star. That being said, I listen to this more then others. Im bumping this to a 4.

This is by far the best music DVD I have ever purchased. This videos really captures the essence of what Grails represents.

I have always felt Grails should do the soundtrack to Game Of Thrones.

If you're reading reviews about a Grails dvd you're wasting your life.
Improve your situation and buy it.
you're late

I helped to film this DVD (distant wide angle on '07 NYC show) .. :) so I may be a bit biased, but I think it came out awesome.. Theres also a whole other NYC area show floating around on Emil's hard drives so I wouldnt be surprised one day to see Acid Rain 2: Acider .. Great DVD Emil, well deserved.
Got this DVD :) they even brought it home...Great cover that fits the video(looks like 70s videos :D) Great..im very glad
